snippet.title: Botanicula Preview Trailer
snippet.description: Botanicula is a point'n'click exploration game created by Jaromír Plachý and Amanita Design. It's about a group of five friends -- little tree creatures who set out on a journey to save the last seed from their home tree, which is infested by evil parasites. The gameplay is about exploration, solving little funny puzzles, meeting strange tree creatures, and paying attention to the music as it provides you with useful clues and hints. The whole game takes place on one huge and strange tree that is inhabited by bizarre and freaky creatures.
